name: Tensor Town Downloadable Client
description: Welcome To Tensor Town! What is Tensor Town? It's whatever you want it to be! Players make everything from rooms to pets to avatars to games! Invite friends and tell others about it! Don't want to sign up yet but still want to check it out? Just enter a room and you will be a guest! Please bear with us, as there will be bugs and hiccups along the way during beta testing. Let us know what you think of Tensor Town! http://www.tensortown.com/ https://discord.gg/cmffAF2 Chrome is removing flash. We have made a downloadable client so users can still play when that happens.
